SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Zenith Utility Services relative to Meridian Energy Network?
SRP.A: Zenith Utility Services is {below} Meridian Energy Network in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total electricity demand?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Zenith Utility Services}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total electricity demand?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Meridian Energy Network}.

NC.Q: Was the total Electricity Demand in 1974 higher or lower than in 1975?
NC.A: The total electricity demand in 1974 was {lower} than in 1975.

NC.Q: Was the total Electricity Demand in 1976 higher or lower than in 1980?
NC.A: The total electricity demand in 1976 was {lower} than in 1980.

NC.Q: Between 1964 and 1981, did the total Electricity Demand experience a larger or smaller change than between 1959 and 1968?

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Meridian Energy Network, Azure Energy Distribution, Zenith Utility Services}.
